metadata.title: CVE-2022-25326 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: fscrypt through v0.3.2 creates a world-writable directory by default when setting up a filesystem, allowing unprivileged users to exhaust filesystem space. We recommend upgrading to fscrypt 0.3.3 or above and adjusting the permissions on existing fscrypt metadata directories where applicable.

criterions.comment: fscrypt package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
